entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kamouraska
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning near noon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 23 January 2023
